content.text: Covers sanitary drainage systems within buildings and premises.
Where a public sewer is available, the building sewer shall be connected.
Approved materials include cast iron, PVC, ABS, copper DWV, and others.
1/4 inch per foot minimum for 2 1/2-inch or smaller piping; 1/8 inch per foot for larger piping.
Shall be made using fittings that ensure flow with minimal turbulence.
Joints shall be tight, durable, and leak-free.
Cleanouts shall be provided for each change of direction greater than 45 degrees in the building drain.
(Additional provisions on interceptors, backwater valves, and storm drainage would follow.)
